ComicInfo.Summary: What began as a routine Bigfoot expedition has quickly transformed itself into a fight for survival. When information of a menacing threat is brought to their attention, the team must decide if saving the life of one is worth risking their own. And while the presence of a well-informed stranger becomes indispensable, the presence of a hostile element could prove to be fatal.
